## Getting Started

### Hands-on Exercise 1: Geospatial Data Wrangling with R

1.  Importing polygon feature data in shapefile format

    ```{r}
    mpsz = st_read(dsn = "Hands-on_Ex1/data/geospatial", 
                      layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
    ```

2.  Importing polyline feature data in shapefile format

    ```{r}
    cyclingpath = st_read(dsn = "Hands-on_Ex1/data/geospatial", layer = "CyclingPathGazette")

    ```

3.  Importing GIS data in kml format

    ```{r}
    preschool = st_read("Hands-on_Ex1/data/geospatial/pre-schools-location-kml.kml")

    ```

5.  Checking the content of a Simple Feature Data Frame
    1.  Working with st_geometry()

```{r}
ggplot(data=mpsz3414, aes(x= as.numeric(`PreSch Density`), y= as.numeric(`PreSch Count`)))+geom_point()
```
